summary: The Hero Factory's mission: to build the bravest, most advanced Heroes in the galaxy! When rookie Rocka responds to a civilian distress call from the planet Quatros.
cast: John Schneider|Henry Winkler|Eric Christian Olsen|Christopher B. Duncan|Stephen Stanton|Tom Kenny|Jason Anthony|Fred Tatasciore|Dee Bradley Baker|Jean Louisa Kelly
title: Lego Hero Factory: Savage Planet
